slimsword.name: Slim Sword
slimsword.desc: A lightweight sword that's easy to use. It has a slightly improved chance to land a critical hit.

bronzesword.name: Bronze Sword
bronzesword.desc: An inexpensive sword. It has low power.

ironsword.name: Iron Sword
ironsword.desc: A low-priced blade that's fairly easy to use. It's the most common sword.

veninedge.name: Venin Edge
veninedge.desc: A sword whose blade conceals a poison reservoir. Units hit with this will be poisoned.

windedge.name: Wind Edge
windedge.desc: A magic blade that creates a shock wave which allows the wielder to attack from near or far.

reference.Damage Calculation: This weapon does not use the user's Magic stat or targets the enemy's Resistance. It uses the user's Strength stat and targets enemy's Defense.

steelsword.name: Steel Sword
steelsword.desc: A sturdy sword with a good edge. It's slightly difficult to wield.

bravesword.name: Brave Sword
bravesword.desc: A rare blade that allows the wielder to strike twice per attack.

ironblade.name: Iron Blade
ironblade.desc: A large, powerful blade that's a bit hard to wield. Its weight makes consecutive attacks difficult.

wodao.name: Wo Dao
wodao.desc: A distinctive blade that allows the wielder to land a high percentage of critical hits.

killingedge.name: Killing Edge
killingedge.desc: This hard-to-find sword has an unusually high chance of landing a critical hit.

wyrmslayer.name: Wyrmslayer
wyrmslayer.desc: A sword designed to deal increased damage to dracoknights and dragon tribe laguz.

steelblade.name: Steel Blade
steelblade.desc: A mighty sword with a large blade. It's hard to handle, and its weight limits consecutive strikes.

stormsword.name: Storm Sword
stormsword.desc: A mystic sword that creates a powerful shock wave. It can be used for direct and indirect combat.

reference.Damage Calculation: This weapon does not use the user's Magic stat or targets the enemy's Resistance. It uses the user's Strength stat and targets enemy's Defense.

silversword.name: Silver Sword
silversword.desc: An expensive sword with a very sharp edge. It's difficult to wield, and wears out quickly.

silverblade.name: Silver Blade
silverblade.desc: A tremendously powerful sword that's very difficult to wield. Its great weight limits multiple attacks.

tempestblade.name: Tempest Blade
tempestblade.desc: A sorcerous blade imbued with the power of gale-force winds. Can strike from near or far.

reference.Damage Calculation: This weapon does not use the user's Magic stat or targets the enemy's Resistance. It uses the user's Strength stat and targets enemy's Defense.

vaguekatti.name: Vague Katti
vaguekatti.desc:
Grants +3 Defense.
A unique and tremendously powerful sword. It's tremendously difficult to use.

alondite.name: Alondite
alondite.desc:
Grants +5 Defense.
A mystic blade blessed by the goddess Ashera. It can attack from near and far.

ettard.name: Ettard
ettard.desc: A huge sword of overwhelming power. Only Ike can wield it.

florete.name: Florete
florete.desc: A lightweight blade that's easy to handle. It uses magic for direct and indirect attacks. For Mist only.

reference.Damage Calculation: This weapon does not use the user's Magic stat or targets the enemy's Resistance. It uses the user's Strength stat and targets enemy's Defense.

caladbolg.name: Caladbolg
caladbolg.desc:
Grants +8 Luck.
A weapon given to the Dawn Brigade by Pelleas in reward for their service. For Edward only.

amiti.name: Amiti
amiti.desc:
Grants +3 Defense, +3 Resistance.
The royal blade of House Crimea. It can be used only by family members and strikes twice per turn.

ragnell.name: Ragnell
ragnell.desc:
Grants +5 Defense.
A supernatural sword blessed by the goddess Ashera. Only Ike can wield it.

slimlance.name: Slim Lance
slimlance.desc: A lightweight lance that's easy to wield. It has a slightly improved chance to land a critical hit.

ironlance.name: Iron Lance
ironlance.desc: A low-priced lance that's fairly easy to use. It is the most common lance.

veninlance.name: Venin Lance
veninlance.desc: A lance that contains a hidden reservoir of poison. Units hit with this will be poisoned.

javelin.name: Javelin
javelin.desc: The most common of throwing spears. It can be used for direct and indirect combat.

horseslayer.name: Horseslayer
horseslayer.desc: A lance designed to deal increased damage against units mounted on horseback.

steellance.name: Steel Lance
steellance.desc: A sturdy lance of medium strength. It is a bit difficult to wield.

bravelance.name: Brave Lance
bravelance.desc: A rare lance that allows its wielder to attack twice in a single turn.

irongreatlance.name: Iron Greatlance
irongreatlance.desc: A powerful lance that's a bit hard to wield. Its weight makes consecutive attacks difficult.

killerlance.name: Killer Lance
killerlance.desc: An uncommon lance that has a high chance of landing a critical hit.

shortspear.name: Short Spear
shortspear.desc: A more powerful throwing spear. It can be used for direct and indirect combat.

steelgreatlance.name: Steel Greatlance
steelgreatlance.desc: A mighty lance that is hard to handle. Its weight limits consecutive strikes.

silverlance.name: Silver Lance
silverlance.desc: A high-priced lance of high strength. It is difficult to wield, and wears out quickly.

silvergreatlance.name: Silver Greatlance
silvergreatlance.desc: A tremendously powerful lance that's very difficult to wield. Its great weight limits multiple attacks.

spear.name: Spear
spear.desc: A refined spear of great power. It can be thrown at distant enemies.

wishblade.name: Wishblade
wishblade.desc:
Grants +3 Luck.
A unique and tremendously powerful lance. It is incredibly difficult to use.

bronzeaxe.name: Bronze Axe
bronzeaxe.desc: An economical axe of low power.

ironaxe.name: Iron Axe
ironaxe.desc: A low-priced axe that is fairly easy to use. It is the most common axe.

veninaxe.name: Venin Axe
veninaxe.desc: An axe whose blade conceals a poison reservoir. Units hit with this will be poisoned.

handaxe.name: Hand Axe
handaxe.desc: The most common of throwing axes. It can be used for direct and indirect combat.

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.desc: A hammer for use against well-protected foes. It is especially effective against heavily armored knights.

steelaxe.name: Steel Axe
steelaxe.desc: A well-made axe of moderate power. It is a bit difficult to wield.

braveaxe.name: Brave Axe
braveaxe.desc: A rare axe that allows its wielder to attack twice in a single turn.

ironpoleax.name: Iron Poleax
ironpoleax.desc: A powerful axe that is a bit hard to wield. Its weight makes consecutive attacks difficult.

killeraxe.name: Killer Axe
killeraxe.desc: An uncommon axe that has a high chance of landing a critical hit.

shortaxe.name: Short Axe
shortaxe.desc: A more powerful throwing axe. It can be used for direct and indirect combat.

steelpoleax.name: Steel Poleax
steelpoleax.desc: A mighty axe that is hard to wield. Its weight makes consecutive attacks difficult.

silveraxe.name: Silver Axe
silveraxe.desc: A high-priced axe of great strength. It is very difficult to wield, and wears out quickly.

silverpoleax.name: Silver Poleax
silverpoleax.desc: A tremendously powerful axe that is very difficult to wield. Its great weight limits multiple attacks.

tomahawk.name: Tomahawk
tomahawk.desc: A well-designed axe of great power. It can be thrown at distant enemies.

urvan.name: Urvan
urvan.desc:
Grants +3 Resistance.
A unique and tremendously powerful axe. It is extremely difficult to use.

tarvos.name: Tarvos
tarvos.desc:
Grants +4 Defense.
A weapon given to the Dawn Brigade by Pelleas in reward for their service. For Nolan only.

ironbow.name: Iron Bow
ironbow.desc: A low-priced bow that is fairly easy to use. It is the most common bow.

veninbow.name: Venin Bow
veninbow.desc: A bow that fires poison arrows. A unit hit by it will be poisoned.

killerbow.name: Killer Bow
killerbow.desc: An uncommon bow that has a high chance of landing a critical hit.

rolfsbow.name: Rolf's Bow
rolfsbow.desc: A unique bow built by the apprentice archer, Rolf. It is both accurate and durable.

ironlongbow.name: Iron Longbow
ironlongbow.desc: A specially constructed longbow with an increased range. It can hit enemies from 3 spaces away.

steelbow.name: Steel Bow
steelbow.desc: A well-made bow of moderate power. It is a bit difficult to wield.

bravebow.name: Brave Bow
bravebow.desc: A rare bow that allows its wielder to attack twice in a single turn.

steellongbow.name: Steel Longbow
steellongbow.desc: A powerful longbow with an increased range. It can hit enemies from 3 spaces away.

silverbow.name: Silver Bow
silverbow.desc: A high-priced bow with great power. It is very difficult to wield and wears out quickly.

silencer.name: Silencer
silencer.desc: An original bow built by the master archer, Shinon. It is a masterpiece of craftmanship.

silverlongbow.name: Silver Longbow
silverlongbow.desc: A tremendously powerful longbow with an increased range. It can hit enemies from 3 spaces away.

doublebow.name: Double Bow
doublebow.desc:
Grants +3 Strength.
A unique and tremendously powerful bow. It is extremely difficult to use.

lughnasadh.name: Lughnasadh
lughnasadh.desc:
Grants +5 Speed.
A weapon given to the Dawn Brigade by Pelleas in reward for their service. For Leonardo only.

bowgun.name: Bowgun
bowgun.desc: A short, mounted bow that shoots stones or quarrels. It can also hit adjacent enemies.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.desc: A moderately powerful crossbow. It can also hit adjacent enemies.

taksh.name: Taksh
taksh.desc: A crossbow that has an unusually high chance of scoring a critical hit.

aqqar.name: Aqqar
aqqar.desc: A very powerful crossbow. It can also hit adjacent enemies.

arbalest.name: Arbalest
arbalest.desc: An extremely powerful crossbow. It can also hit adjacent enemies.

ballista.name: Ballista
ballista.desc: A long-range weapon for use by archery units. It is very effective against flying enemies.

ironballista.name: Iron Ballista
ironballista.desc: A powerful ballista for use by archery units. It is very effective against flying enemies.

killerballista.name: Killer Ballista
killerballista.desc: A ballista that has a high chance of dealing a critical hit. It is very effective against flying units.

onager.name: Onager
onager.desc: A long-range, stone-throwing siege weapon with a wide area of effect. For archery units only.

fire.name: Fire
fire.desc: Low-level fire magic. It is very effective against beast tribe laguz.

elfire.name: Elfire
elfire.desc: Mid-level fire magic. It is very effective against beast tribe laguz.

meteor.name: Meteor
meteor.desc: Long-range fire magic. It is very effective against beast tribe laguz.

arcfire.name: Arcfire
arcfire.desc: High-level fire magic. It is very effective against beast tribe laguz.

bolganone.name: Bolganone
bolganone.desc: Extremely powerful fire magic. It is very effective against beast tribe laguz.

rexflame.name: Rexflame
rexflame.desc:
Grants +3 Speed.
Fire magic of the highest order. It is very effective against beast tribe laguz.

firetail.name: Fire Tail
firetail.desc: Unique fire magic used by spirits.

cymbeline.name: Cymbeline
cymbeline.desc: The ultimate fire magic. It is very effective against beast tribe laguz. Only Sanaki can wield it.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.desc: Low-level lightning magic. It is very effective against wyverns and dragon tribe laguz.

elthunder.name: Elthunder
elthunder.desc: Mid-level thunder magic. It is very effective against wyverns and dragon tribe laguz.

bolting.name: Bolting
bolting.desc: Long-range lightning magic. It is very effective against wyverns and dragon tribe laguz.

arcthunder.name: Arcthunder
arcthunder.desc: High-level thunder magic. It is very effective against wyverns and dragon tribe laguz.

thoron.name: Thoron
thoron.desc: Extremely powerful lightning magic. It is very effective against wyverns and dragon tribe laguz.

rexbolt.name: Rexbolt
rexbolt.desc:
Grants +3 Skill.
Lightning magic of the highest order. It is very effective against wyvern and dragon tribe laguz.

thundertail.name: Thunder Tail
thundertail.desc: Unique lightning magic used by spirits.

wind.name: Wind
wind.desc: Low-level wind magic. It is very effective against winged units.

elwind.name: Elwind
elwind.desc: Mid-level wind magic. It is very effective against winged units.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.desc: Long-range wind magic. It is very effective against winged units.

arcwind.name: Arcwind
arcwind.desc: High-level wind magic. It is very effective against winged units.

tornado.name: Tornado
tornado.desc: Extremely powerful wind magic. It is very effective against winged units.

rexcalibur.name: Rexcalibur
rexcalibur.desc:
Grants +3 Luck.
Wind magic of the highest order. It is very effective against winged units.

windtail.name: Wind Tail
windtail.desc: Unique wind magic used by spirits.

light.name: Light
light.desc: Low-level light magic. It can only be wielded by those dedicated to serve good.

ellight.name: Ellight
ellight.desc: Mid-level light magic. It can only be wielded by those dedicated to serve good.

purge.name: Purge
purge.desc: Long-range light magic. It can only be wielded by those dedicated to serve good.

shine.name: Shine
shine.desc: High-level light magic. It can only be wielded by those dedicated to serve good.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Extremely powerful light magic. The spell caster receives HP equal to the damage inflicted.

valaura.name: Valaura
valaura.desc: A corruption of very high light magic. A unit hit by it will be poisoned.

rexaura.name: Rexaura
rexaura.desc:
Grants +3 Defense.
Light magic of the highest order. It can only be wielded by those dedicated to serve good.

thani.name: Thani
thani.desc: A unique light magic spell. Very effective against armored and horse-mounted units. For Micaiah only.

creiddylad.name: Creiddylad
creiddylad.desc: Light magic of the highest order. Used only by those favored by the goddess. For Sephiran only.

worm.name: Worm
worm.desc: Mid-level dark magic. Few spellcasters can master the intricacies of these fell arts.

carreau.name: Carreau
carreau.desc: High-level dark magic. Few spellcasters can master the intricacies of these fell arts.

fenrir.name: Fenrir
fenrir.desc: Long-distance dark magic. Few spellcasters can master the intricacies of these fell arts.

verrine.name: Verrine
verrine.desc: Extremely powerful dark magic. Few spellcasters can master the intricacies of these fell arts.

balberith.name: Balberith
balberith.desc:
Grants +3 Strength.
Dark magic of the highest order. Few spellcasters can master the intricacies of these fell arts.

bronzeknife.name: Bronze Knife
bronzeknife.desc: An economical throwing knife. It can be used on distant enemies, too.

bronzedagger.name: Bronze Dagger
bronzedagger.desc: An economical combat knife of low power.

ironknife.name: Iron Knife
ironknife.desc: The most common type of throwing knife. It can be used on distant enemies, too.

beastkiller.name: Beast Killer
beastkiller.desc: A special blade designed for use against beast tribe laguz. It does increased damage to such foes.

steelknife.name: Steel Knife
steelknife.desc: A sturdy and powerful throwing knife. It can be used on distant enemies, too.

irondagger.name: Iron Dagger
irondagger.desc: A low-priced combat blade that is a bit hard to use. It is the most common dagger.

kard.name: Kard
kard.desc: A low-powered dagger that is hard to use and has a high chance of landing a critical hit.

steeldagger.name: Steel Dagger
steeldagger.desc: A well-made dagger of moderate power. It is difficult to wield.

silverknife.name: Silver Knife
silverknife.desc: A finely crafted throwing knife with a razor edge. It can be used on distant enemies, too.

stiletto.name: Stiletto
stiletto.desc: A razor-sharp dagger that is very difficult to wield but has a high chance of landing a critical hit.

silverdagger.name: Silver Dagger
silverdagger.desc: A high-priced dagger of high strength. It is very difficult to wield, and wears out quickly.

peshkatz.name: Peshkatz
peshkatz.desc: The ultimate throwing knife. It can be used on distant enemies, too.

baselard.name: Baselard
baselard.desc: The ultimate dagger. It has a high chance of landing a critical hit.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc:
A staff that restores 10 HP plus the wielder's Mg to a target unit. It also heals the wielder each turn.
**Equip Effect:** Restores 5 HP.

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc:
A staff that restores 20 HP plus the wielder's Mg to a target unit. It also heals the wielder each turn.
**Equip Effect:** Restores 15 HP.

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.desc:
A staff that opens locks. It raises the wielder's speed and defense.
**Equip Effect:** +3 Speed, +1 Defense,

torch.name: Torch (Staff)
torch.desc:
A staff that illuminates an area for a short while. The wielder's vision range increases by 2.
**Equip Effect:** +2 Vision Range

ward.name: Ward
ward.desc:
A staff that temporarily raises an ally's resistance. It raises the wielder's speed and defense.
**Equip Effect:** +2 Speed, +2 Defense.

restore.name: Restore
restore.desc:
A staff that restores a unit to normal condition. It also restores the wielder's condition each turn.
**Equip Effect:** Restores normal status.

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc:
A staff that restores 10 HP plus the wielder's Mg to a distant unit. Heals the wielder each turn.
**Equip Effect:** Restores 20 HP.

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc:
A staff that returns a weapon or staff to maximum durability. It raises the user's speed and defense.
**Equip Effect:** +1 Speed, +3 Defense.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc:
A staff that silences enemy mages for five turns. Each turn, the wielder is cured of silence.
**Equip Effect:** Cures Silence.

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.desc:
A staff that puts enemy units to sleep for five turns. Each turn, the wielder is cured of sleep.
**Equip Effect:** Cures Sleep.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc:
A staff that teleports allied units to a space near the wielder. It raises the user's speed and defense.
**Equip Effect:** +5 Speed, +4 Defense.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc:
A staff that restores all HP to the target. It also heals the wielder each turn.
**Equip Effect:** Restores 25 HP.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc:
A staff that heals all surrounding allied units. It also heals the wielder each turn. HP restored = (Magic + 10)
**Equip Effect:** Restores 30 HP.

elsilence.name: Elsilence
elsilence.desc:
A staff that silences enemy mages for five turns. Senatorial research has strengthened it.
**Equip Effect:** Cures Silence

elsleep.name: Elsleep
elsleep.desc:
A staff that puts enemy units to sleep for five turns. Senatorial research has strengthened it.
**Equip Effect:** Cures Sleep

matrona.name: Matrona
matrona.desc:
A staff that restores all HP to a distant target. It also raises the target's biorhythm to its peak.
**Equip Effect:** +5 Defense, Restores 20 HP as well as status.

asherastaff.name: Ashera Staff
asherastaff.desc:
Restores all HP and restores conditions to normal for all allied, reinforcement and other units.
**Equip Effect:** +5 Defense.

redbreatha.desc: The crimson breath of a red dragon. It never runs out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

redbreaths.desc: The crimson breath of a red dragon. It never runs out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

Targets foe's resistance.

Targets foe's resistance.
The ivory breath of a white dragon. It never runs out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

Targets foe's resistance.
The ivory breath of a white dragon. It never runs out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

blackbreathdragonprincea.desc: The mighty breath of Goldoan's rulers. It never runs out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

herb.name: Herb
herb.desc: A plant that restores 10 HP when consumed.

vulnerary.name: Vulnerary
vulnerary.desc: A potion that restores 20 HP when consumed.

concoction.name: Concoction
concoction.desc: A potion that restores 40 HP when consumed.

elixir.name: Elixir
elixir.desc: A potion that restores all HP when consumed.

antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
antitoxin.desc: A draught that neutralizes the effects of poison when consumed.

panacea.name: Panacea
panacea.desc: A heady elixir that returns the unit to normal condition when consumed.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: A phial of blessed water that temporarily raises resistance when consumed.

olivigrass.name: Olivi Grass
olivigrass.desc: An herb that restores 15 points to a laguz's transformation gauge.

laguzstone.name: Laguz Stone
laguzstone.desc: An item that fills up the transformation gauge, allowing laguz to shift forms. For laguz only.

laguzstone2.name: Laguz Stone (2)
laguzstone2.desc: An item that fills up the transformation gauge, allowing laguz to shift forms. For laguz only.

laguzgem.name: Laguz Gem
laguzgem.desc: An item that allows laguz to maintain their animal form an entire battle. For laguz only.

shinebarrier.name: Shine Barrier
shinebarrier.desc: A useful item that creates a single-space magical barrier through which no one can pass.

spectrecard.name: Spectre Card
spectrecard.desc: A special item that lets non-magic users launch a magical attack.

reapercard.name: Reaper Card
reapercard.desc: A special item that lets non-magic users launch a moderately powerful magical attack.

daemoncard.name: Daemon Card
daemoncard.desc: A special item that lets non-magic users launch a very powerful magical attack.

doorkey.name: Door Key
doorkey.desc: A key that unlocks doors, allowing units to move through that space.

chestkey.name: Chest Key
chestkey.desc: A key that unlocks treasure chests. Items inside are automatically acquired.

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: A special card that reduces all items to half price.

reference.Notes: Using the Silver Card in the Japanese version will not earn forging points.

redgem.name: Red Gem
redgem.desc: A moderately valuable gemstone worth 2,500 gold.

whitegem.name: White Gem
whitegem.desc: A very valuable gemstone worth 10,000 gold.

warppowder.name: Warp Powder
warppowder.desc: IF THIS APPEARS IT'S A BUG. REPORT IT.

seraphrobe.name: Seraph Robe
seraphrobe.desc: An item that increases max HP by 7.

energydrop.name: Energy Drop
energydrop.desc: An item that increases strength by 2.

spiritdust.name: Spirit Dust
spiritdust.desc: An item that increases magic by 2.

secretbook.name: Secret Book
secretbook.desc: An item that increases skill by 2.

speedwings.name: Speedwings
speedwings.desc: An item that increases speed by 2.

asheraicon.name: Ashera Icon
asheraicon.desc: An item that increases luck by 2.

dragonshield.name: Dragonshield
dragonshield.desc: An item that increases defense by 2.

talisman.name: Talisman
talisman.desc: An item that increases resistance by 2.

boots.name: Boots
boots.desc: An item that increases movement by 2.

statuefrag.name: Statue Frag
statuefrag.desc: An item that increases build by 2.

armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: An item that raises the weapon level of the equipped weapon by one grade. For beorc only.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: An item that allows non-promoted units of level 10 or higher to upgrade classes. For beorc only.

mastercrown.name: Master Crown
mastercrown.desc: An item that allows promoted units of level 10 or higher to upgrade classes. For beorc only.

holycrown.name: Holy Crown
holycrown.desc: An item that allows promoted units of level 10 or higher to upgrade classes. For Mist only.

satorisign.name: Satori Sign
satorisign.desc: An item that imbues the user with a powerful skill when used. For laguz of level 30 and higher only.

coin.name: Coin
coin.desc: A treasure you can sell for 1 gold. You can use it at the forge in your base.

rudolgem.name: Rudol Gem
rudolgem.desc:
Grants +10 Defense.
A mysterious magic gem that raises the defense of the holder by +10.

shriekscroll.name: Shriek Scroll
shriekscroll.desc: Hawk and Raven Laguz units only. Teaches <:fe10_shriek:1317298605492801546>Shriek.

maelstromscroll.name: Maelstrom Scroll
maelstromscroll.desc: Hawk and Raven Laguz units only. Teaches <:fe10_maelstrom:1317298168869818439>Maelstrom.

bloodtidescroll.name: Blood Tide Scroll
bloodtidescroll.desc: Red Dragon Laguz units only. Teaches <:fe10_bloodtide:1317297644170772612>Blood Tide.

whitepoolscroll.name: White Pool Scroll
whitepoolscroll.desc: White Dragon Laguz units only. Teaches <:fe10_whitepool:1317298722639708240>White Pool.

nighttidescroll.name: Night Tide Scroll
nighttidescroll.desc: Black Dragon Laguz units only. Teaches <:fe10_nighttide:1317298238004662393>Night Tide.

laguzguard.name: Laguzguard
laguzguard.desc: Beorc units only. Halves Laguz damage.

beorcguard.name: Beorcguard
beorcguard.desc: Laguz units only. Negates laguz effective bonus towards user.

knightward.name: Knight Ward
knightward.desc: Knights, Generals, Cavaliers, Paladins, Soldiers and Halberdiers only. Grants +2 Defense, +2 Resistance, +30% Speed Growth.
